Muses: The 9 Inspirational Goddesses of Greek Mythology - Mythology Dictionary - See U in History[1]

ΟΥ̓ΡΑΝΊΑ (URANIA)

The Muse Of Astronomy

URANIA, 4TH CENTURY BC

The most detailed map of galaxies, black holes and stars ever made | Juna Kollmeier[2]
A stellar history of modern astronomy | Emily Levesque[3]
An In-Depth Exploration Of Our Solar System | The Secrets Of The Universe | Spark[4]
Segre Lecture: How Did The Universe Begin?[5]
The Weirdest Stars in the Universe | Public Lecture[6]
Interstellar Main Theme - Extra Extended - Soundtrack by Hans Zimmer[7]

ΚΑΛΛΙΌΠΗ (CALLIOPE)

The Muse who presides over eloquence and epic poetry.

DETAIL OF PAINTING THE MUSES URANIA AND CALLIOPE BY SIMON VOUET.

The Eloquence Of Christopher Hitchens[8]
The Epic Poetry Of Amanda Gorman[9]
Maya Angelou Recites Inaugural Poem for Pres. Clinton[10]
Poet Richard Blanco Delivers Inaugural Poem - Obama's Second Inauguration[11]
Praise Song for the Day[12]
Aretha Franklin Performs at the Inauguration of President Obama[13]
Classics Summarized: The Iliad[14]
The Iliad | Book Summary in English[15]
Classics Summarized: The Odyssey[16]
A Long and Difficult Journey, or The Odyssey: Crash Course Literature 201[17]
Classics Summarized: The Aeneid[18]
Kurt Vonnegut, Shape of Stories[19]

ΚΛΕΙΏ (CLIO)

The Muse of history.

CLIO, MUSE OF HISTORY BY CHARLES MEYNIER

Madison Calley's Harp (Pixar's Up)[20]
Amy Turk's Harp (Toccata and Fugue in D Minor)[21]
Howard Zinn at MIT 2005 - The Myth of American Exceptionalism[22]
Howard Zinn: A People's History of the United States (1999)[23]
Manufacturing Consent: Noam Chomsky and the Media[24]
Education For Whom and For What?[25]

ἘΡΑΤΏ (ERATO)

Goddess of The Poetry Of Desire

ROMAN STATUE OF ERATO (2ND CENTURY AD), PLAYING THE KITHARA OR LYRE.

Dirty Dancing[26]
Titanic 1997 Unseen[27]
Time Machine - Godspeed[28]
Twilight, End of the Battle[29]

ΘΆΛΕΙΑ (THALIA)

Thalia presided over comedy and idyllic poetry.

ROMAN STATUE OF THALIA FROM HADRIAN'S VILLA, NOW AT THE PRADO MUSEUM (MADRID)

Fran Drescher's Wasabi[30]
Van Down By The River[31]
Birth[32]
Amish Paradise[33]
Julia Sweeney's Comedy[34]
Always Look On The Bright Side Of Life[35]

ΜΕΛΠΟΜΈΝΗ (MELPOMENE)

Melpomene muse of chorus, eventually became the muse of tragedy.

ROMAN STATUE OF MELPOMENE, 2ND CENTURY AD.

Jasmin Roberts - For White Poets[36]
Asia Bryant-Wilkerson - White ppl are crzy![37]
Asia Bryant Wilkerson - The Pot Calls the Kettle Black[38]
Porsha Olayiwola - Unnamed[39]
Porsha Olayiwola - Water[40]
Porsha Olayiwola - Capitalism[41]
Porsha Olayiwola - Trigger[42]
Sabrina Benaim - Explaining My Depression to My Mother[43]
Slam Poetry - 5 Things I've learned from my mother[44]
Nora Cooper - I Won't Write Your Obituary[45]
To This Day ... for the bullied and beautiful - Shane Koyczan[46]
Los Angeles Team - Somewhere in America[47]

ΠΟΛΥΎΜΝΙΑ (POLYHYMNIA)

Goddess of Hymns

ROMAN STATUE OF POLYHYMNIA, 2ND CENTURY AD, DEPICTING HER IN THE ACT OF DANCING.

Johnny Cash - Hurt[48]
Mylène Farmer feat. Gary Jules - Mad World (Timeless 2013 Live) - HD[49]
Blue Oyster Cult - Don't Fear The Reaper (Single Version) (1976) (HD)[50]
Nowhere Man[51]
Simon & Garfunkel - The Sounds of Silence[52]
Simon & Garfunkel - I Am A Rock[53]
Rihanna - Diamonds[54]
Adele - Skyfall[55]
Enigma - Sadeness[56]
James Brown, Can you see the light, Blues Brothers movie[57]
Louis Armstrong - What A Wonderful World[58]
Eddie Vedder - Guaranteed (Into The Wild)[59]
Wild, Ending Speech[60]
Wild, El Cóndor Pasa[61]

ΕΥ̓ΤΈΡΠΗ (EUTERPE)

Goddess of Music, Lyric Poetry.

EUTERPE (ST. PETERSBURG)

Dave Grohl and Animal Drum Battle - The Muppets[62]
Ancient double aulòs - Tursen[63]
How To Play A Double Native Flute[64]
Bettina Joy de Guzman[65]
LaWaJ - Teaser : Des Airs - Didgeridoo / Flute BeatBox[66]
William Barton's Didgeridoo[67]
Techno Didgeridoo in Perth[68]
Khusugtun - Praise of Chinggis Khaan[69]
Clanadonia[70]
Crazy Drummers vs European X[71]
Nyangostar & Kaparu Mini ❤️[72]
Khatia Buniatishvili's Etude op.10 no.12 by Frederic Chopin[73]
Jain's Makeba (Makeba is someone who has the ability to soothe and calm a person in distress)[74]
Jain's Come[75]
Kenji Kawai[76]
I Am a Man Of Constant Sorrow[77]

ΤΕΡΨΙΧΌΡΗ (TERPSICHORE)

Goddess of Dancing and Chorus.

TERPSICHORE ON AN ANTIQUE FRESCO FROM POMPEII

The Owl and the Pussycat[78]
Rita Hayworth Sing and Dance Scene[79]
Down to Eath (1947) - Terpsichore Song[80]
Doris Day - Shaking the Blues Away[81]
The Addams Family Dance of Lurch & Wednesday Addams[82]
Beetlejuice[83]
BeetleJuice Banana Boat Song[84]
Footloose Final Dance 1984 to 2011[85]
Pulp Fiction - Dance Scene[86]
Favorite video of ME AND MOM shuffling! 2017[87]
Shuffle Tutorial Basics Running Man, T Step and Variations[88]
HOW TO SHUFFLE DANCE | Evelina[89]
Anastasiia Kirilik's Ultimate Shuffle Dance Tutorial[90]
